授業方法: The course takes Full Online format (as of May 27, 2022). Please refer to LUNA regularly, check class announcements and review your learning materials as instructed. Students will be expected to read extensively, and to prepare thoroughly for class.

第1回:
Introduction and Course Overview
Definitions and Concepts of Marketing Strategy
Download and carefully review a more detailed version of syllabus from LUNA before the first session.
第2回: Market-Oriented Strategic Planning (1): Market-oriented strategic planning
Read assigned chapters of the textbook and work with course materials available at LUNA before the class.
第3回: Market-Oriented Strategic Planning (2): Business unit strategic planning and SWOT analysis
Read assigned chapters of the textbook and work with course materials available at LUNA before the class.
第4回: Market Segmentation (1) : Definition of Segmentation; Strategic meanings of segmentation
Read assigned chapters of the textbook and work with course materials available at LUNA before the class.
第5回: Market Segmentation (2): Finding appropriate variables to segment; Practical flow of segmentation
Read assigned chapters of the textbook and work with course materials available at LUNA before the class.
第6回: Targeting: Focusing firm’s resources to chosen segments;  Alternative targeting strategies
Read assigned chapters of the textbook and work with course materials available at LUNA before the class.
第7回: Market Segmentation(3): Practitioner’s Point of View on market segmentation
Read assigned chapters of the textbook and work with course materials available at LUNA before the class.
第8回: Creating Brand Equity: Corporate and Brand identities as the starting point for marketing strategies
Read assigned chapters of the textbook and work with course materials available at LUNA before the class.
第9回: Positioning (1): Deciding competitive “weapons” to use; How to be successful in differentiation
Read assigned chapters of the textbook and work with course materials available at LUNA before the class.
第10回: Positioning (2): Creating marketing mixes to achieve desirable position; Positioning techniques for practitioners
Read assigned chapters of the textbook and work with course materials available at LUNA before the class.
第11回: Developing Product and Service Concepts; Roles of Product (and service) concepts in marketing strategies and tactics
Read assigned chapters of the textbook and work with course materials available at LUNA before the class.
第12回: Managing the Total Marketing Effort: How firms organize, implement, evaluate and control marketing and communication activities
Read assigned chapters of the textbook and work with course materials available at LUNA before the class.
第13回: Achieving Consistency among Marketing Mix Elements: How to achieve consistencies in marketing mix elements and making them work more efficient.
Read assigned chapters of the textbook and work with course materials available at LUNA before the class.
第14回: Read assigned chapters of the textbook and work with course materials available at LUNA before the class.
